com.bounswe2015group5.controller

Class ContributionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bounswe2015group5.controller.ContributionController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/contributions",
                produces="application/json")
 @Api(description="The contributions controller",
     name="Contribution Services")
public class ContributionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for contribution functionality. Uses RestController annotation to be treated as a controller. Uses RequestMapping annotation which is treated as ResponseBody semantically.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Class that defines the context of the contribution.

      Class that defines RateResponse
      static class  ContributionController.VotingContext
      Class that defines votingContext.

 @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=GET)
 @ApiResponseObject
public Contribution findOne(@ApiPathParam(name="id") @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             int id)
        Finds a contribution given its id. ContributionService is used to enable this process.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the contribution
        Returns:
        returns the corresponding contribution.

 @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @ApiResponseObject
public Contribution save(@ApiBodyObject @RequestBody

                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder uriComponentsBuilder,
                                                                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        uriComponentsBuilder - Builder for uriComponents
        request - Http Servlet Request
        Returns:
        contribution saved

      • delete

        @ApiMethod
 @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
public void delete(@ApiPathParam(name="id") @PathVariable
                                                                                                                        int id)
        Deletes a contribution from its repository given its id. Deletes its relations also. Uses contributionService to do this.
        Parameters:
        id - contribution id
